title: ► Luxury downtown Bristol - 2 bedroom STONE HARBOUR condo
description: 2 bedroom, 1 bath, 1200 sf luxury condo available for April 15th occupancy.

1st floor condo is located on the street side of the development. High-end kitchen appliances, gas fireplace, and hardwood floors. Common amenities include pool and fitness center, and extensive landscaped grounds. Outdoor unassigned parking in a common lot, or nearby on-street parking.
Stone Harbour has a private marina and residents have the option to rent a boat slip on an annual basis for an additional fee.
Minimum 1 year lease with good references and credit check required. No smoking within the building. Small pets considered.

title: Amazing Home Available Now
description: Fully furnished, nicely maintained. Great neighborhood located 1 mile from Rodger Williams University! Two blocks from park, bus line and beach. Ten minute walk to downtown Bristol. Spacious backyard including private driveway and off street parking. Bright sunny living room, eat-in kitchen, large basement with storage space and laundry. Lawn care is included. First month's rent and security deposit due at signing. Approval based on credit check and reference required. RWU Grad students & Faculty welcome! Owner pays for trash, sewer and lawn care. Tenant responsible for utilities. Wired for high speed internet.

description: 3-level townhouse in Bristol's North Farm. Unit has central AC, wall-to-wall carpeting, double-door closets, fireplace, and 2-car attached garage. Direct access to the bike path, tennis courts, pool and yacht club, private dock and beach, gated entry.

title: First Floor Two Bedroom in Historic Bristol Home
description: Enjoy life in quaint Bristol, RI. This first floor, two bedroom unit features charming historic built-ins, an extra large living room, high ceilings, in-unit washer/dryer and a large back yard. Gas heat with on street parking. Walk to downtown, waterfront, common and bike path. Property owner is seeking a tenant with positive credit, landlord and employment references. The property owner maybe be willing to negotiate for one cat as a pet in this unit.  Sorry, no dogs. Looking to lease for Feb 1 but, for the right tenant, the owner may be willing consider a March lease.

title: Two Bedrooms on First Floor Granite and Stainless Kitchen
description: Be close to all that Bristol has to offer within walking distance. This first floor two bedroom has brand new flooring and carpets throughout. Stainless steel appliances with granite counters. Tastefully decorated with neutral colors and finishes throughout. Completely renovated a little over a year ago. RWU upperclassmen and grad students may be considered with a positive rental history and a parental guarantee. This unit is available February 1 but the owner would consider March 1 for the right tenant. Sorry, no pets.

title: Perfectly situated charming home 2 blocks from the sea
description: Home is located in historic and charming Bristol, Rhode Island. Flanking the sea, the town is peppered with restaurants, parks, boutique shops and antique stores.
This sun-filled home boasts three bedrooms, 1 full bath, large modern kitchen, living room and library. Relax in the private backyard and enjoy cocktails or coffee on the sundeck.
This home is only 1 block from the parade route. Celebrate the festivities include the 2 week concert series, carnival, and fireworks.
The house is conveniently located just 13 miles north of Newport. Newport offers beaches, shopping, restaurants, and Gilded Age mansions.
DETAILS:
Furnished or unfurnished rental.
Bedrooms: 3 (There are  and 1 full bed in the bedrooms upstairs. The couch in living room is a new and comfortable pullout + 2 queen beds )
Bathrooms: 1 full bath
Two vehicles can fit in the driveway. There is no overnight parking on the street.
Pets Allowed: Yes
2 month security deposit
3 month lease with utilities included in rent.

title: LG Bristol Apt w/new remodeled bathroom, garage & yard
description: This is a large 2nd floor apartment in a 2 family Bristol home that is offered to a group of 4. This unit has a large living room and 3 bedrooms. One of the 2nd floor bedrooms and the living room contains new rugs while the other 2 bedrooms all have hardwood floors. Both living room rugs and the bedroom rug will be professionally cleaned before new tenants move in. The kitchen has a refrigerator, stove and dishwasher.
- The unit will have 2 tenants share the large back bedroom which has 2 closets. The other 2 tenants will have their own bedroom.
- There is a large Basement with plenty of room for the tenants to mingle with guests as well as 2 entrances/exits (1 of which leads to the backyard). The basement has its own bathroom and sink.
- New washer and new dryer free to use by the tenants in the basement.

- In January of 2019 the  bathroom was completely gutted out and renovated to now include new tile, granite vanity with 2 sinks, new toilet, new light fixtures/ceiling fan/mirrors, and a new large shower with specially ordered “frosted” door.
- The home itself sits on 12,000 square foot property that has an enormous yard maintained by the owners and available for use by the tenants that includes an outdoor patio and fire pit.
- The unit will have access to 1 spot in the private driveway and 1 spot in the 2 car garage along with plenty of off-street parking.
- Quick walk to the town common area (0.9 miles), restaurants and shops in downtown Bristol (1.5 miles), as well as a short commute to RWU (1.5 miles).
- The entire unit will be professionally cleaned before move in.
- Landlords provide professional snow removal and yard maintenance.
- Lease will run for one year from June 2020 thru May 2021.
**Feel free to email any questions or to set up a viewing time. Thanks.**

title: LG House w/ huge yard,2 car garage, New Baths avail June ‘20- May ‘21

-	The home itself sits on 12,000 square foot property that has an enormous yard maintained by the owners and available for use by the tenants that includes an outdoor patio and fire pit.

title: RWU Apt in New Home w/Private Parking, Yard, W&D & dishwasher
description: This is one side of a large Bristol duplex (40B which is side of duplex furthest from the street) that was built in 2008 and has 3 bedrooms, full kitchen, 1 full bathroom, 1 half bathroom, large living room, private driveway that fits 3 cars per unit and a spacious yard.  This apartment has plenty of storage space in the basement
-	Each bedroom in the house has a full closet with shelves.
-	The kitchen has a refrigerator, stove and dishwasher plus an abundance of cabinet space.
-	The kitchen and bathrooms are all in terrific condition as the home was built less than 10 years ago and has been previously rented to individual families.
-	In the basement there is a new washer and new dryer (all of which are non-coin operated and are thus free to use by the tenants).
-	Carpet was replaced throughout the whole house in August of 2016 (all bedrooms, living room, and closets have new rug with padding)
-	There is a driveway that easily fits 3 cars for the unit and plenty of off-street parking.
-	Quick walk to the town common area (0.6 miles), restaurants and shops in downtown Bristol (0.75 miles), as well as a short commute to RWU (2.5 miles).
